languages.text: "Воры лиц с Тассеры. Они здесь. Пришли за нами". {n}Соломон отвечает отрывисто, словно лает. Все его тело сведено судорогой.{/n}
"The face stealers from Thassera. They're here. They've come for us," {n}Solomorne says jerkily, almost barking the words. Tremors rack his whole body.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Воры лиц с Тассеры. Они здесь. Пришли за нами". {n}Соломон отвечает отрывисто, словно лает. Все его тело сведено судорогой.{/n}

"The face stealers from Thassera. They're here. They've come for us," {n}Solomorne says jerkily, almost barking the words. Tremors rack his whole body.{/n}

languages.text: « Les voleurs de visages de Thassera. Ils sont là. Ils veulent nous tuer, » {n}explique Solomorne, qui tremble violemment de la tête aux pieds. Ses propos hachés semblent presque incohérents.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The face stealers from Thassera. They're here. They've come for us," {n}Solomorne says jerkily, almost barking the words. Tremors rack his whole body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Les voleurs de visages de Thassera. Ils sont là. Ils veulent nous tuer, » {n}explique Solomorne, qui tremble violemment de la tête aux pieds. Ses propos hachés semblent presque incohérents.{/n}

languages.text: 「タッセーラの『顔盗り』どもだ。奴らはここにいる。俺たちを狙ってるんだ！」{n}ソロモーンは言葉を吐き捨てるように、途切れ途切れに叫ぶ。彼の全身は激しく震えていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The face stealers from Thassera. They're here. They've come for us," {n}Solomorne says jerkily, almost barking the words. Tremors rack his whole body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「タッセーラの『顔盗り』どもだ。奴らはここにいる。俺たちを狙ってるんだ！」{n}ソロモーンは言葉を吐き捨てるように、途切れ途切れに叫ぶ。彼の全身は激しく震えていた。{/n}

languages.text: «Los ladrones de caras de Thassera. Están aquí. Vienen a por nosotros». {n}El tono de Solomorne es entrecortado, casi parece que ladra. Está temblando.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The face stealers from Thassera. They're here. They've come for us," {n}Solomorne says jerkily, almost barking the words. Tremors rack his whole body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Los ladrones de caras de Thassera. Están aquí. Vienen a por nosotros». {n}El tono de Solomorne es entrecortado, casi parece que ladra. Está temblando.{/n}

languages.text: “塔瑟拉那些偷脸的窃贼，他们来了，他们来找我们了。”{n}索罗蒙急促地开了口，几乎咆哮着说出了这些话，浑身剧烈地颤抖着。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The face stealers from Thassera. They're here. They've come for us," {n}Solomorne says jerkily, almost barking the words. Tremors rack his whole body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “塔瑟拉那些偷脸的窃贼，他们来了，他们来找我们了。”{n}索罗蒙急促地开了口，几乎咆哮着说出了这些话，浑身剧烈地颤抖着。{/n}

languages.text: "Thasseralı yüz hırsızları burada. Bizi öldürmeye gelmişler." {n}Solomorne sarsılıyor, sesi yırtıcı bir hayvanı andırıyor. Tüm vücudu gerginlikle titriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The face stealers from Thassera. They're here. They've come for us," {n}Solomorne says jerkily, almost barking the words. Tremors rack his whole body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Thasseralı yüz hırsızları burada. Bizi öldürmeye gelmişler." {n}Solomorne sarsılıyor, sesi yırtıcı bir hayvanı andırıyor. Tüm vücudu gerginlikle titriyor.{/n}

languages.text: "Die Gesichtsdiebe von Thassera. Sie sind hier. Sie wollen uns holen", {n}sagt Solomorne ruckartig und scheint die Worte beinahe zu bellen. Er zittert am ganzen Leib.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The face stealers from Thassera. They're here. They've come for us," {n}Solomorne says jerkily, almost barking the words. Tremors rack his whole body.{/n}
